scripts.db:generate: pnpm run db:generate:sqlite && pnpm run db:generate:postgresql && pnpm run db:generate:mysql
scripts.db:migrate: pnpm run db:migrate:sqlite && pnpm run db:migrate:postgresql && pnpm run db:migrate:mysql
scripts.db:migrate:sqlite: DATABASE_PROVIDER=sqlite tsx ./prisma/updateModels.ts && DATABASE_PROVIDER=sqlite prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:migrate:postgresql: DATABASE_PROVIDER=postgresql tsx ./prisma/updateModels.ts && DATABASE_PROVIDER=postgresql prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:migrate:mysql: DATABASE_PROVIDER=mysql tsx ./prisma/updateModels.ts && DATABASE_PROVIDER=mysql prisma migrate dev
